mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.customer_id AS "customer.id", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.total_quantity AS "totalQuantity", a.status AS "status", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.delivery_date AS "deliveryDate", a.delivery_cycle AS "deliveryCycle", a.has_after_sale AS "hasAfterSale", a.after_sale_amount AS "afterSaleAmount", a.after_sale_detail AS "afterSaleDetail", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", c.company_name AS "customer.companyName"
LEFT JOIN bus_customer c ON c.id = a.customer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_sale_order( customer_id, total_amount, total_quantity, status, order_date, delivery_date, delivery_cycle, has_after_sale, after_sale_amount, after_sale_detail, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{customer.id}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalQuantity}, #{status}, #{orderDate}, #{deliveryDate}, #{deliveryCycle}, #{hasAfterSale}, #{afterSaleAmount}, #{afterSaleDetail}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_sale_order SET customer_id = #{customer.id}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, total_quantity = #{totalQuantity}, status = #{status}, order_date = #{orderDate}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate}, delivery_cycle = #{deliveryCycle}, has_after_sale = #{hasAfterSale}, after_sale_amount = #{afterSaleAmount}, after_sale_detail = #{afterSaleDetail}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
